Text: Oñ i leatu adiko kʼowñ la dago o̩lʼoduda Ge̩ne̩sare̩t kʼo̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ nake̩che̩ bʼo ma ku ma gbo̩ O̩la O̩jo̩;
i fʼo̩ko̩ meji ki dago o̩lʼoduda le̩ li, amekwuji la kwʼef uwñ tane̩, oñ ma jʼagwe̩ iga-ma.
Oñ i kwo tef o̩ko̩ le̩ʼka, e-kʼi chʼe-Saimo̩n, i la bi u kʼi ke̩che̩ ubi bʼane̩ te̩ pe̩e̩. Tak i kwoguane̩ ef o̩ko̩ le̩ ako̩ o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ e̩wñ.
Oñ abu kʼi we o̩la le̩ eka i ka ñwu Saimo̩n kakini, Ke̩che̩ tugbo ki nefu ku me̩ mʼiga-me̩ konyʼomi ku me̩ fa.
Taku Saimo̩n dohi kakini, O̩dafe̩, a chʼakanya gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩, a la mu e̩wñ du n! ama tod o̩la kʼe̩ ka nakʼiga nyʼomi.
Tak abu ku ma fʼe-le̩ che, ma fʼe̩ja bunyi e̩ko̩; oñ iga-ma ako̩da;
taku ma nʼoji do̩ abo umana-ma ku ma jʼef o̩ko̩ omune̩ le̩, ku ma wa bʼuma che. Taku ma lewa, oñ ma konyʼo̩ko̩ meji e̩ko̩, todabe̩le̩ ma chane̩ ewomi.
Abu ku Saimo̩n Pita fʼu li, i kwofiane̩ okuku e̩re̩ Jisus, i kakini, Ondu, kwo bʼumi te̩, todabu kʼu chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ adure.
Todu e̩gahi fʼu mu kpai abo du ku ma manyʼuwñ noj e̩ja ku ma mu le̩;
Jeme̩s kpai Jo̩n, amo̩ma Ze̩be̩di kʼama kpai Saimo̩n atuta, ño̩ dʼabe̩le̩ ge̩. Taku Jisus ka ñwu Saimo̩n kakini, E̩ ki railo n; akwifai, amone̩ oñ uwe̩ amu;
tak abu ku ma mʼo̩ko̩-ma komʼane̩, ma tʼe̩wñ du no̩, oñ ma tʼo̩ ubi.

Tak i leatu abu kʼi dʼef ewoʼka, me̩ go, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka kʼo̩ga-ikpemute che̩ko̩ o̩la-wñ lewa; oñ abu kʼi li Jisus, i lewane̩ afejubane̩ma, i gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kakini, Ondu, iche̩wñ kʼi dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩, e̩ neke je̩ ñwu mi de̩hiolo.
Tak i fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala kadʼo, i kakini, I dʼumi e̩do̩; e̩ ki de̩hiolo. Ababale̩ o̩ga-ikpemute le̩ kwobʼo̩ te̩.
Tak i hiu owu kʼi we eka ñw e̩ne̩ du; ama e̩ nalo we̩, kʼe̩ du o̩la-we̩ ña atama O̩jo̩, e̩ ki la ne̩ e̩wñ wa kʼe̩ du fʼo̩la-we̩ gworinyo̩ alu ku Mose̩s ñwate̩, kʼi chʼe̩wñ ibenu ñwu ma.
Ama o̩la o̩la-wñ le̩ ño̩ mukpatuka tule; tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ wewe wajo̩ ku ma gbo̩, kʼi laño̩ fʼe̩gbo-ma chekpa.
Owñ muda hinyubi tef aje̩tachi achadua.

Tak i leatu o̩jo̩ʼka kʼi do̩mo̩ akʼone̩ e̩wñ, kʼabo Farisi kpai abo ku ma kʼone̩ o̩lo̩da ku ma kwo ewo ewo Galili kpai e-Judia kpai e-Je̩rusale̩m du wa ño̩ gugu jʼo̩mo̩; ukpahiu Ondu laño̩ dʼane̩ kʼi fʼo̩ga o̩la-ma chekpa.
Me̩ la go, aboke̩le̩ ne̩ e̩ne̩ o̩ga e̩ku-to̩laʼka oj akpata awa; ma feju ku ma nʼe̩ wʼejefu ku ma dʼu tane̩ o̩gba owñ.

Tak abu ku ma ma li alu ku ma ale ku ma ne̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ gudu wa tod o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ n, ma mute̩gu tʼojokunyi, oñ ma tʼo̩ no̩ wane̩ kpai akpata-wñ lef ojokunyi ku ma du ama che tʼalumeji-ma o̩gba Jisus.
Tak abu kʼi li e̩do̩-ekono-ma i kakini, One̩, ma tʼadure-we̩ no̩ ñw e̩ me̩.
Tak amako̩takada kpai amaFarisi chane̩ eji-ñwa kakini, E̩ne̩ ako̩la achakpabie̩ O̩jo̩-i? E̩ne̩ neke tʼadure no̩ chai O̩jo̩ kate?
Ama abu ku Jisus li iñwa ku ma je̩ le̩, i dohi ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ jiñwa ef e̩do̩-me̩?
Kali e-ki tukpo̩ eka tule kakini, Ma tʼadure-we̩ no̩ ñw e̩ me̩, abe̩ku ma aka kakini, Kwane̩ kʼe̩ lule̩?
Ama todu ku me̩ ki ma ka kʼO̩ma One̩ chenʼo̩da ane̩-ile̩ kʼi tʼadure one̩ no̩ ñw u (i ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki chʼo̩ga-ekuto̩la le̩) kakini, Naka ñw e̩, Kwane̩, mʼakpata-we̩ du kʼe̩ lo tʼunyi-we̩.
Tak e̩re̩re̩le̩ i kwane̩ eju-ma, oñ i mʼe̩wñ kʼi dachi oji-wñ le̩ du, i kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼunyi-wñ kpai ojima edu ñw O̩jo̩.
Ibe o̩gbo̩-ma chaka du la mukpatuka, oñ ma dojima ñw O̩jo̩; efu-ma la che̩ko̩ ñw ailo, ma kakini, E̩wñ-aduña oñ a li eñini.
Tak ubi e̩wñ kide̩-i i kwodufu oñ i li agbo̩kane̩ʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Lifai, i gugu ugbo ku ma gba o̩kane̩, tak i ka ñw u kakini, Tʼumi ubi.
Tak i tʼe̩wñ du no̩, oñ i kwane̩ atʼo̩ ubi.
Taku Lifai fʼo̩jojo lile hi ñw u ef unyi-wñ; oñ o̩wo̩ amagbo̩kane̩ lile kpai abo ki bo̩ chekukane̩ jʼo̩mo̩ aje̩wñ kpai ama.
Tak amaFarisi kpai amako̩takada-ma keñmini nyʼamako̩che̩-wñ o̩la kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ aje̩wñ, kʼame̩ la añmo̩ kpʼamagbo̩kane̩ kpʼame̩nadure-i?
Oñ Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Eku obochi aku abo ku ma nʼo̩lafia n, chai abo kʼo̩la-ma ma nyo̩ n.
U wa kʼu do̩ abo̩kpakpa n chai ame̩nadure ku ma lef uribeda.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini Amako̩che̩ Jo̩n ajialu o̩gbe̩nugbe̩, ma la nʼo̩ko̩ agba bʼO̩jo̩: abe̩le̩ abo e-amaFarisi jʼache ge̩; abo e-we̩ muda aje̩ ma la añmo̩.
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ neke che kʼabokolobia o̩ko̩ya-etito̩ ajialu e̩gba kʼo̩ko̩ya tito̩ dugbo ma?
Iko-wñ muda awa; owñ chʼe̩gba du ku ma mʼo̩ko̩ya tito̩ du kwobʼuma te̩, e̩gbale̩ chʼiko ku ma ajialu.
I laño̩ kpita ñwu ma kakini, I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki afa otogbo tito̩ na kʼi abʼu ga mʼotogbo igbele n; i dabe̩le̩ i afʼetito̩ na, oñ e-kʼi bu kwef e-tito̩ la acheju e-igbele n.
I la nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi adʼomi-achiwebe̩te̩ma tito̩ danyʼaiko igbele n; i fʼabe̩le̩ che mak omi achiwebe̩te̩ma tito̩ le̩ akpʼaiko na adafo, aiko-wñ ñʼakpabie̩ ge̩.
Ma muda adʼomi-achiwebe̩te̩ma tito̩ danyʼaiko tito̩ tila.
I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki ñmo̩ e-igbele kʼe-tito̩ adʼowñ e̩do̩ n; todu i kakini, E-igbele rinyo̩ alu.
